GSD.product_version: versions from v5.8 to before v5.15.33
GSD.description:
watch_queue: Free the page array when watch_queue is dismantled

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.33 by commit 4913daecd04addb41bc96a9175a885e1c19862a8, it was introduced in version v5.8 by commit c73be61cede5882f9605a852414db559c0ebedfd. For more details please see the references link.
